author: okaz.com.sa
title: Ground News - With Saudi efforts.. The crisis is on the way to a settlement.. Yemen breathes peace
text:
Summary by okaz.com.sa Yemenis are closing the year 2023, with great hopes for resolving the crisis, after the announcement by UN envoy Hans Grundoberg of a “road map”, which came as a result of great Saudi efforts led by Riyadh over the past months, which resulted in maintaining calm and reducing hostilities. The year 2024 will be a turning point in the lives of Yemeni people from wars and conflicts to peace, stability, development and the return of the state to Sana… Share menu More
